item.title: Show HN：我制作了最困难的焦点应用程序
item.description:
我的手机暗中抢劫了我的所有梦想，我什至都不知道它变得如此糟糕。 when i saw my screen time being about 11hrs with ~95 phone pickups per day, i realized how bad it got.my problem is that i could not avoid social media entirely as i post actively because i’m involved in marketing and branding.I tried the usual, app blockers & time limits, but i always find myself hitting “one more minute” like a junkie.i’m not looking for a complete social media absence or deleting everything as these radical solutions don’t fit my lifestyle and needs and i tend to come back needing even more.the ideal solution for me would be that when i decided to focus on something for specified time i SHOULDN’T reach out to my phone instinctively and needed a wrist slap every time i did so.three weeks later i put out the first version of the @hardestfocusapp - it’s built on a simple, physical truth: to focus, you must disengage.the core mechanic of the app is a commitment device.focus starts not with a button tap, but with a physical act of disengagement with the phone itself that adapts to any situation:- keep it face down on a desk for deep work.- put in the pocket while walking or commuting.- lock the phone for long and uninterrupted focus.this makes the act of disengagement itself as a trigger for start of focus.the consequence is just as真实的。拿起电话触发了5秒钟的警报决斗。 无法将其放回原来将消除所有取得的进步，使用损失厌恶的概念 - 强大的动机 - 害怕失去进度更引人注目的实际奖励。面对面，警告警报器太大了，感觉就像是手腕上的一巴掌，我立即将手机放下。
评论url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=449966058 点：10 ＃评论：3
